src.CornerCreator module¶

class src.CornerCreator.CornerCreator(corner_width, corner_curvature)¶

Bases: object

Create corners with a given curvature from 0 to 1.

Corners size is defined by corner_width. Type of corners are defined by corner_curvature:

  • 0: no corners,

  • from 0 to 0.5: hyperbolic convex corners,

  • 0.5: linear corners,

  • from 0.5 to 1: hyperbolic concave corners,

  • 1: square corner.

property Curve¶

Corner curvature from 0 to 1.

property Width¶

Defines corner size (Width x Width).

apply_corner(arr, corner)¶

Apply corner mask to arr corners with a correct rotation.

corner_function(x)¶

Calculate lenght of corner line in x row.

get_alpha(size)¶

Return PIL Image alpha channel with 0 in corners and boundary.

If size < 2.1 Width, the corners don’t appear.

get_corner()¶

Return boolean array with (Width x Widht) corner.

hyperbole(x)¶

Hyperbolic h(x).

  • h(0) = Width,

  • h(Width * Curve) = Width * Curve,

  • h(Width) = 0.

linear(x)¶

Linear L(x).

  • L(0) = Width,

  • L(Width * Curve) = Width * Curve,

  • L(Width) = 0.

smooth_boundary(mask)¶

Put zeros to the boundary points of mask.

src.fonts module¶

src.fonts.get_system_fonts()¶

Return sorted list of all system font names.

src.grid module¶

src.grid.grid_frame(frame, frame_rows=[0], frame_cols=[0], parent_row=0, parent_column=0, frame_sticky='snwe', is_root=False)¶

Grid frame and configure frame_rows and frame_cols.

frame_rows, frame_cols:

Lists of indexes of frame rows and cols respectively to configue. These rows and cols become stretchable.

parent_row, parent_col, frame_sticky:

frame.grid arguments: row, col, sticky respectively.

If is_root, parent_col, parent_row and frame_sticky are ignored.

src.mainwindow module¶

class src.mainwindow.Application(master=None)¶

Bases: tkinter.Frame

Simple Collage Creator application main window.

The window consists of two frames: menu and workspace.

The menu contains control buttons and fields for entering collage parameters:

  • Undo, Redo, Load, Save, Save as..., Print buttons at the top,

  • Width, Height, Margin, Corner width, Corner Curvature entries in the middle,

  • Change parameters, Add text buttons below it.

The workspace contains Collage object in the middle and four buttons for adding photos (one on each side).

add_photo(where)¶

Run file system dialog and place photo on collage.

where values:

  • ‘s’ is South (upper side),

  • ‘n’ is North (down side),

  • ‘w’ is West (left side),

  • ‘e’ is East (right side).

Adding a photo from one side of the collage border. In this case, the new cell appears on this side of the collage and takes up half of the collage regardless of size. All previously existing cells are compressed to make room for a new cell.

change_canvas_parameters()¶

Validate and apply user input from menu entries.

create_canvas_frame(frame, row, col)¶

Create, grid and bind workspace units.

create_change_buttons(frame, row, col)¶

Create, bind and bind menu bottom buttons block.

create_entries(frame, row, col)¶

Create, grid and bind menu entries block.

create_menu_buttons(frame, row, col)¶

Create, grid and bind menu top buttons block.

create_widgets()¶

Create and grid menu and workspace.

get_add_photo_command(where)¶

src.textconfig module¶

class src.textconfig.TextConfigureApp(master=None)¶

Bases: tkinter.Frame

Simple Collage Creator second window.

Used for adding a caption to a collage. Allows user to customize a content and a style of the caption.

The window consists of five blocks:

  • text redactor,

  • font chooser,

  • canvas with an intermediate result,

  • font parameters input fields: italic, bold, underlined checkboxes and font size entry,

  • buttons block: Change color..., Try font, OK buttons.

choose_color()¶

Run askcolor dialog and show intermediate result.

choose_font()¶

Update font and show intermediate result.

create_buttons(frame, row, col)¶

Create and grid buttons block.

create_canvas(frame, row, col)¶

Create, configure and grid result canvas.

create_font_chooser(frame, row, col)¶

Create and grid font chooser listbox, fill the options.

create_modifiers(frame, row, col)¶

Create and grid font modifiers block.

create_text_redactor(frame, row, col)¶

Create, grid and initialize text redactor.

create_widgets()¶

Create and grid all widgets.

draw()¶

Show intermediate result on the canvas.

get_return()¶

Return canvas with stylized capture.

ok_quit()¶

Update result canvas and close the window.
